title: Soccer Is a Kick!
description: Using simple text and explanatory photographs, Soccer Is a Kick! teaches students about one of the world’s most popular sports. The book covers basic rules, positions, equipment, and moves of the game, while delivering trivia and historical information in sidebars and captions. While students learn about soccer, they will also have the chance to study the author’s purpose and prepositional phrases.
highFrequencyWords: cleats, dribbling, foul, goal, match, tie
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
awareness: Prepositional Phrases                : Recognize and use prepositional phrases
phonics: Multiple Meaning Words                : Define and use multiple-meaning words
grammar:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
